Row.Text: "I am the maker of my own destiny."
"Our words are to be believed, when we say a thing we stand to it."
Annihilation is at hand unless we unite in one common cause against the common foe.
"Kill no more animals than are necessary to feed and clothe you."
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on the [icon:CITY_RURAL] Mawaskawe Skote for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route while you have at least 3 [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors active.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
You can add [icon:WAR_SUPPORT] War Support other Leader's [icon:WAR] Wars 3 times instead of 1.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for the [icon:UNIT_KISPOKO_NENA_TO] Kispoko Nena'to per positive [icon:WAR_SUPPORT] War Support.
+4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Farming Towns and +4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Fishing Towns.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards the initiating and progressing the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project.

+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every time a Storm, Flood, or Volcanic Eruption has provided Fertility this Age. [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements, [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts do not get damaged by Storms.
+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra, Desert, and Plains Terrain in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
